heroSection.faculty: Faculty of Mathematics and Informatics, University of Bucharest
heroSection.teaser: Cariere returns this year with a lot of opportunities for students
heroSection.welcome: Welcome to the official website of the Cariere project!

aboutSection.eventDescription1: is a job and internship fair that fosters students' professional development by connecting participants with some of the most well-known IT companies in Romania.
aboutSection.eventDescription2: Since 2010, Cariere has brought together top IT employers and curious students with a passion for the tech field with the help of volunteers from the Mathematics and Computer Science Student Association.
aboutSection.partners: Discover the offers of our partners
aboutSection.partnersDescription: Partner companies provide students with relevant information regarding their recruitment and hiring process through interactive presentations and workshops, where participants can learn more about their work profiles.
